column4: hey, I just built a brand-new computer, and booted the Ubuntu desktop/live CD .... I get a blank Gnome screen, and NOTHING happens, and I figured out that it's because for some reason I don't have administrative rights.  What could be happening?  This is odd.
figure out how to add yourself to the admin group using commandline
I know how to do that....but then I have to figure out how to manually do EVERYTHING that should be happening at boot
I am saying that what happens is that it BOOTS with no root privs....lol
